titles.title: To require the Federal Trade Commission to consider including Smart Grid capability on Energy Guide labels for products.
To require the Federal Trade Commission to consider including Smart Grid capability on Energy Guide labels for products.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: Amends the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to require the Federal Trade Commission to initiate and complete a rulemaking to consider making a special note in a prominent manner on any Energy Guide label for products that include Smart Grid capability to explain that the value of the feature depends on the Smart Grid capability of the utility system and that the use of such capability could reduce the customer's costs.
